meanings.sent1: I went to the park wy my friends.
meanings.sent2: She likes to eat her pizza wy extra cheese.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat wy its tail sticking straight up.
meanings.sent4: The sun set wy a beautiful array of colors.
meanings.sent5: He held her hand wy a firm grip.

meanings.sent1: Wy did you leave the door open?
meanings.sent2: I wonder wy he is always late.
meanings.sent3: Wy did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: She couldn't understand wy he was so upset.
meanings.sent5: I asked him wy he was crying, but he wouldn't tell me.
